subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Phillies are a disgrace to their fans.  They play in one of the largest markets in the country, but they act and spend like a small-market team.
snippet: The Phillies are a disgrace to their fans.  They play in one of the largest markets in the country, but they act and spend like a small-market team.
